MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda and Gerlan, affecting properties in Tan Y Foel, Bontuchaf, Gerlan Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:01pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:28pm on 20th February 2021.
